name: check_order_status
description: Check the current status of a customer's order
what_to_do: Retrieve order information including current status, tracking number, and estimated delivery date based on the order ID provided by the customer

name: initiate_return
description: Start the return process for a customer
what_to_do: Collect order number, reason for return, and generate a return authorization number and shipping label for the customer

name: process_refund
description: Process a refund for a returned item
what_to_do: Verify return eligibility, calculate refund amount, and initiate refund to the customer's original payment method

name: update_account_information
what_to_do: Modify customer account information such as email, phone number, or addresses based on customer request

name: escalate_to_human
description: Escalate complex issues to a human support agent
what_to_do: Create a support ticket with all conversation context and customer information, then notify the customer that a specialist will follow up within the specified timeframe

name: send_password_reset
description: Send a password reset link to the customer
what_to_do: Verify customer identity and send a secure password reset link to their registered email address

name: track_shipment
description: Provide detailed tracking information for a shipment
what_to_do: Look up the tracking number and provide real-time shipment status, location, and estimated delivery date

name: cancel_order
what_to_do: Verify the order can be cancelled (within 1 hour of placement), cancel the order, and process any applicable refund
